title: The Dulugar
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Alpine regions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: My love of stories and my love of the bush grew at the same time.
description: My love of stories and my love of the bush grew at the same time. Stories bring the land to life. A story about a man's connection to his Indigenous ancestors through the Victorian Alpine country and the stories that would pass through the generations, especially the one about the Dulugar, a fierce creature said to exist in the region, haunting campers with their red eyes and devil-like smell.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001800; Mountains of memories : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
